whatIsService.title: What Are Acne Scars & Marks?
whatIsService.content:
Even after acne heals, many people are left with scars and marks that can linger for years.

> Acne Scars - Permanent changes in skin texture such as pits,
> depressions, or raised areas caused by deep acne inflammation.
>
> Acne Marks (Post-Inflammatory Hyperpigmentation) - Dark spots or
> reddish-brown patches left behind after pimples heal.

Both can affect your skin’s smoothness and your confidence but with the right treatment, they can be effectively reduced.

faqs.title: FAQs on Acne Scars & Marks Treatment in Pune

questions.question: 1. Can acne scars be completely removed?
questions.answer: Most scars can be significantly improved, though very deep scars may not vanish 100%. Treatments smoothen and lighten them greatly.

questions.question: 2. How many sessions are needed for results?
questions.answer: Usually 3-6 sessions, depending on scar severity and treatment type.

questions.question: 3. Is acne scar treatment painful?
questions.answer: Most treatments are well-tolerated. Numbing cream is used to keep you comfortable.

questions.question: 4. How soon will I see results?
questions.answer: Improvements begin after 2–3 sessions, with continued results over months.

questions.question: 5. Are acne scar treatments safe for darker skin?
questions.answer: Yes, all our procedures at The Skin Firm are customised and safe for Indian skin tones.

questions.question: 6. Do acne marks (dark spots) fade on their own?
questions.answer: Mild marks may fade with time, but deeper pigmentation often needs treatment.

questions.question: 7. Which treatment is best for pitted scars?
questions.answer: Microneedling RF and fractional lasers work best for deep scars.

questions.question: 8. Is there downtime after treatment?
questions.answer: Minimal to moderate, depending on the procedure. Most people return to work the next day.

questions.question: 9. Can men also get acne scar treatment?
questions.answer: Absolutely, many of our patients are men looking to improve their skin confidence.

questions.question: 10. Will scars return after treatment?
questions.answer: Treated scars don’t return, but new acne can cause new scars. Maintenance skincare is key.
